modName: theRoadstrokers Rogue Sorceress Outfit Green Retexture
summary:
A re-texture that changes the color of the amazing theRoadstrokers Rogue Sorceress Outfit.
Original mod required!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://puu.sh/9kPex/24a0722793.png[/img]

Tauriel the companion mod inspired me to find a Lord of the Rings elvish-archer stylish armor. I couldn't find any other than theRoadstrokers Rogue Sorceress Outfit, but the colors were not what I was looking for so I decided to recolor it and upload it here for you other Tauriel or Lord of the Rings lovers.

This is a retexture that changes the color of theRoadstroker's Rogue Sorceress Outfit to green. This is my first ever upload here at Nexus and I don't have any plans to continue doing more of these.

This mod only contains the texture for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21313/?][color=#58FA58]Rogue Sorceress Outfit[/color][/url] so make sure you download it first. This mod only changes the color of the cloak and the white shirt both to green.


[img]http://puu.sh/9kPOW/81ecc54601.png[/img]

Only the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21313/?][color=#58FA58]ORIGINAL MOD[/color][/url].


[img]http://puu.sh/9kPPV/ee1780bdfa.png[/img]

1. Extract files from archive into Skryim data folder.
2. Click ''yes to all'', and overwrite.

If you want to uninstall go to Skyrim directory Data/textures/Armor/theRoadstroker/Sorceress and delete Main_diff or overwrite with the original texture.

Or just install/uninstall with Mod manager. And when asked to overwrite click ''yes to all''


[youtube]HWvKE2_8qp0[/youtube]


[img]http://puu.sh/9kPRk/40e49c547c.png[/img]

[color=orange]ALL THE CREDIT GOES TO THEROADSTROKER FOR MAKING THIS ARMOR![/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21313/?]

[color=#58FA58]Rogue Sorceress Outfit[/color][/url] - Original mod.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1281817/?][color=#58FA58]theRoadstroker[/color][/url] - Original mod author.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27064/?][color=#58FA58]KDCirclets Redone[/color][/url] by zzjay - for the circlets.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38368/?][color=#58FA58]Noldorian Hadhafang Reborn and other Elven Blades[/color][/url] by EcthelionOtW - for the elven sword.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?][color=#58FA58]ApachiiSkyHair[/color][/url] by Apachii - for the hairstyles.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13992/?][color=#58FA58]The Bow of the Drow[/color][/url] by Nicoroshi - for the nice Lord of the Rings stylish bow.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21489/?][color=#58FA58]Tauriel Companion from The Hobbit[/color][/url] by m0ckin9bird - Tauriel from The Hobbit.
[img]http://puu.sh/96vTh/7d17205772.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/96w0X/7f964af3c4.jpg[/img]

Check also [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27336/?][color=#DA81F5]Rogue Sorceress Outfit Re-texture[/color][/url] by CrimsonFairy - for a purple re-texture of this armor.

Feel free to post screenshots![/center]
author: maakb and theRoadstroker
